p: TP has an average elevation of over 4000 m. It is the largest plateau in China with the highest altitude in the world ( Figure 1a). It is about 2945 km long from east to west and 1532 km wide from north to south. The total area is about 2.62 × 10 6 km 2, accounting for 26.8% of China’s total land area [ 10].
